advancements.hyperl.hyperlane_gel_residu: This is leftover from collecting the surface gel of this biome.
advancements.hyperl.hyphinity.title: Hyphinity Dimension
advancements.hyperl.hyphinity.descriptio: Energy builds up within you while moving through the air quickly.
advancements.hyperl.hyphinity_shard.desc: From the depths bright lights illuminate something mysterious.
advancements.hyperl.hyphinity_boots.desc: Feels like a force is pulling these to the ground.
advancements.hyperl.voiderous.title: Voiderous Dimension
advancements.hyperl.dimensional_bridge_b: Used to place blocks below you as you walk forward.
